quote: Everybody liked better to conjecture how the thing was, than simply to know it; for conjecture soon became more confident than knowledge, and had a more liberal allowance for the incompatible.
quote_letters: EVERYBODY LIKED BETTER TO CONJECTURE HOW THE THING WAS THAN SIMPLY TO KNOW IT FOR CONJECTURE SOON BECAME MORE CONFIDENT THAN KNOWLEDGE AND HAD A MORE LIBERAL ALLOWANCE FOR THE INCOMPATIBLE

chat:
ghetto - Urban area with impoverished population.
ejected - Forced out of a place or position.
objected - Expressed or raised an opposition to something.
ribbon - Strip of fabric or material used for decoration.
Guthrie - Folk singer and songwriter.
everyone - All people included in a group.
Elliott - Name of a person.
Lowell - City in Massachusetts.
incapable - Unable to do or achieve something.
Oklahoma - State in the southern United States.
they're - Contraction of "they are".
mansion - Large, imposing house.
Isfahan - City in Iran.
downtown - Commercial and business center of a city.
detached - Separate, disconnected.
lawyers - Professionals trained in the field of law.
embankment - Wall or bank of earth or stone built to prevent a river from flooding.
Motown - Nickname for the city of Detroit, Michigan.
accident - Unintentional and unfortunate event.
runoff - Overflow of water from a field, road, or other surface.
cockpit - Compartment where the pilot sits in an aircraft.
horror - Feeling of intense shock or disgust.
